Posts.Content: Go to the emerg or a walkin clinic  ASAP and tell them  to have a look because it is sore and you have discharge coming from your nipple. The first thing is to remain calm you may only have an infection.  Don't think of the worse case scenario However see a Dr right away for your own peace of mind!!
Posts.Title: Husband found lump in my breast

Posts.Content: I agree Arimidex is pure HELL in fact I was on all of them and they all were I stopped them my joints have never been the same 5 years later the pain is unbearable at times...
Posts.Title: staring new drug

Posts.Content: I can relate to that. My hair was long and thick before Chemo. After the growth thin  and well not thick at all. Are you taking Arimidex or any of the hormone blocking drugs>  I did and that stunted the growth of my hair and in fact as it was growing some was coming out. A second suggestion I always had long hair. I let mine grow too However it just wasn't working. i  had a short but not terribly short hair cut giving me layers which made it appear thicker along with some of the hair products  hair glues and pastes sounds terrible but my teenage son put me in touch with them See a hairstylist if you can  My hair grew back nearly 4 years ago still thin but doesn't look  stringy on my head any longer...
Posts.Title: need product info for my hair growth after chemo

Posts.Content: Hi I had a double mastectomy 5 years ago. I am now going into my 6th year.   No doubt it is a scary process. We are thrown into an emotional rollercoaster sometimes wondering why?  Be angry it's really OK cry if you want no worries!  You may have people give yu all kinds of advise but listen to your Dr.'s but be your own advocate too. If you have questions write them down. Talk to your Dr .  It isn't about all the right or wrong things we do, I did everything I was suppose to and yet ended up with Cancer. If you have to have Chemo get a Port a Cath.  It is much easier than the Picc . Start flexing your  hands to make sure you have mobility after a few days start stretching your arms upward It will hurt I promise but the sooner you do you won't have the frozen shoulder issues and the quicker you will have full use.. Try not to listen to all the stories of your friends sisters grandmother's best BFF who had the Exact same thing..Nope no two cancers are alike!   Give yourself a break It's not your fault!  Keep a journal or blog .. People well intentioned will say keep smiling it's all about your attitude. well guess what there are some days you don't feel like it you want to be left alone to be with your own thoughts. Your feelings are valid.. Feel free to contact me if you need some encouragement or just a place to vent..... Mostly we are here for you !!
Posts.Title: Mastectomy in two weeks, STUCK in anger??

Posts.Content: I know exactly how you feel. I could barely get out of bed and to stand or walk each footstep was painful I saw my Oncologist told him I was done. He wasn't happy at my decision but I felt that  all this pain was killing me slowly. I did not want to depend on pain medication.I stopped it all. The residule pain stays with you but at least now I can at least move.
Posts.Title: Side Effects of Arimidex After Almost 2 Years

Posts.Content: Having a great support system like you have is half the battle. No one should ever tell you what you should or should not do because a PHARMA Company tells you this is your sure bet of a cure. There are no guarantees. Like yoyur sister after 14 months taking it and nearly being crippled, now nearly a year off. I still have residule pain chances are I always will the damage was done. But I will never let anyone try and convince me that these drugs are a cure. Good Luck.....
Posts.Title: Side Effects of Arimidex After Almost 2 Years

Posts.Content: http://csn.cancer.org/node/230669 http://www.livestrong.com/article/103698-dangers-tamoxifen/ http://www.innerself.com/Health/tamoxifen.htm here are a few links.
Posts.Title: Side Effects of Arimidex After Almost 2 Years

Posts.Content: I have taken Arimidex  and all the other ones , when the pain in my joints became so horrendous I could barely walk I did take a short break. However it continued. Do we take something that side effects leave you feeling worse? I stopped taking everything. It was a decision that I made for myself knowing there was a risk. It;s been 10 months so far so good. Yet there are those who take the meds end up with reccurence anyway.  It was Either way we have no gurantees these drugs will work
Posts.Title: Side Effects of Arimidex After Almost 2 Years

Posts.Content: In the past 5 months I have lost three friends who were on all of these drugs as well. Had gone through chemo radiation, tried one then another. It was a vicious circle.  As much as these drugs may work for some quite effectively there is no thing as one size fits all. Some people are resistant. It has little to do with changing your attitude keep a continual smile on your face and be greatful, sorry Im not grateful. This is not normal or a new normal, that term is so over used. When I was on Tamoxifen it was suggested I have my ovaries removed. If I have to resort to surgery for every medication I take then maybe they need to re-look at these meds and find a better solution to preserve your ovaries. I told him (Gynocologist) If it ain't broke don't fix it. At the end of the day he agreed. So often procedures are used as a just in case.... there my oncologist agreed. My body hurts, my bones still ache, I try exercise riding my bike walking, but the damage was done. . So when i hear that phrase "The new normal" What comes to my mind, there is Nothing Normal about this!
Posts.Title: Side Effects of Arimidex After Almost 2 Years

Posts.Content: If it works for you that's good. But as previously mentioned not all drugs work for everyone. It may be a lifesaver but what quality is your life when you can barely move or feel half crippled. It is a choice people have to make for themselves Quality vs Quantity.No I'm not anxious to die. But taking it  is no gurantee. My close friend was on it she died this past January 25th, did them all too none seemed to work except leave her in dire pain...... I stopped taking it nearly a year ago No regrets...
Posts.Title: Side Effects of Arimidex After Almost 2 Years

Posts.Content: The side effects are pretty much the same because they belong family of drugs. I was on all of them . When my quality of life was affected it was either keep taking this become a cripple or live and enjoy life
Posts.Title: Side Effects of Arimidex After Almost 2 Years

Posts.Content: Arimidex does slow down the hair growth, My hair began falling out after the growth began as soon as i began taking Arimidex. It has not really grown back since. My hair is quite thin on top. Below is from the Arimidex web site http://www.arimidex.net/safety-and-side-effects/ The most frequently reported adverse reactions (with a frequency of ≥10%) are1: Headache, Hot Flushes, Nausea, Rash, Arthralgia/joint  stiffness, Arthritis, Osteoporosis, Asthenia. Side effects reported less frequently (≥1% and <10%) include Anorexia, Hypercholesterolaemia, Somnolence, Carpal Tunnel Syndrome, Diarrhoea, Vomiting, increases in alkaline phosphatase, alanine aminotransferase and aspartate aminotransferase, Hair thinning (alopecia), Allergic reactions, bone pain, Vaginal dryness, Vaginal bleeding. ===================================== Either way it's a lose lose situation, another reason I will no longer take these drugs. Far too many side effects that could end up being more detrimental
Posts.Title: Side Effects of Arimidex After Almost 2 Years

Posts.Content: I haven't had a bath in three years just showers, There is no way that I could get out out of the tub. I would love dearly to be able to, i have no one to help if i get stuck,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,
Posts.Title: Side Effects of Arimidex After Almost 2 Years

Posts.Content: I have been off everything Arimidex, Femara Tamoxifen  for a year now. I just had all my scans, ultra sounds CTScans blood work and I am fine,in fact my Oncologist even agrees that these drugs are not the sure fire cure that they are made out to be. I was diagnosed stage3 grade3 Multi-focal Breast Cancer I did not do radiation either. The drugs just suck the life out of you and deplete all the calcium marrow what ever in your bones. I was scared because I was told there might be serious consequences getting off, well the fear quickly left as my joint pain began to subside. I eat so many foods that are hight in Vitamin A C & D I take Vitamin B12. I still have joint pain the damage has been done but I don't regret one second that I stopped taking Arimidex here is a good place to see how others are dealing with side effects and the side effects contributing to their poorer quality of life. Mine went down the tubes. It wasn't till later my Oncologist told me I only had a 4% chance improving with these drugs. So why put anyone through this torture??  http://www.askapatient.com/viewrating.asp?drug=20541&nam Good luck please feel free to contact me if you have any questions...
Posts.Title: Side Effects of Arimidex After Almost 2 Years

Posts.Content: Sorry I mean no disrespect but are you kidding? It might come back but not as bad? That's like saying you're a little pregnant but not sure... If the cancer comes back he has no way in predicting how bad or what stage even.  The thing is we don't know that Armidex does avoid cancer at all costs. Women who take the drug faithfully still develop METS.  In fact many  die  who develop  a recurrence .I could give you several examples of this very issue of women I have known who have recently died from METS. who took not only Arimidex but the others in hoping it would work its magic instead of crippling pain.
Posts.Title: Side Effects of Arimidex After Almost 2 Years

Posts.Content: Absolutely agree with you. Please be careful of the TAMOXIFEN as well I was fine never had issues, started the drug I developed cervival polys excessive bleeding this was after forced menopause, the Dr has told me I ruh a high risk of developing Cervical Cancer. Just what we need right? One more Cancer. I have stopped everything, When you start weighing the odds of quality it is quality all the way....He wanted me to take a hormone shot monthly that gave no guarantee it would make a difference.
Posts.Title: Side Effects of Arimidex After Almost 2 Years

Posts.Content: METS means METASTATIC that it has spread to other areas  ie::soft organs, brain, lymph nodes, bone. I was diagnosed with Stage3 Grade3 Multifocal Breast Cancer with several  definite  lymph node involvement.I had more than 3 malignant tumors removed had a  mastectomy, the following year my second breast  was removed.
Posts.Title: Side Effects of Arimidex After Almost 2 Years

Posts.Content: Next month it will be a year that I no longer take the drugs.... All is fine......
Posts.Title: Side Effects of Arimidex After Almost 2 Years

Posts.Content: Susier People don't get it.  They think because you had the surgery did the treatment that it's finished. It's far from over in fact it's never over. I have heard people say how they were they were diagnosed with Cancer because it made them reflect. if it takes cancer to do that then what were they doing before? I'm a single mother I barely had support from my family, I'm told to get over it your cancer is gone. Since when was there a cure for cancer?  People say be happy Cancer is not a Happy Disease. I have multifocal Breast Cancer Stage3 Grade3 . I had found some thickening on my side, my Dr told me it was a little fatty tissue, Nothing to worry about. It turned out a few months later after another Dr in Emerg asked me about my swollen arm  asked if I had breast cancer Shocked I said no he sent me for an Ultra sound from that day there is no Normal.......My Dr was wrong had I left it a little longer I would not be typing this.....  Believe me you are not the only one your pain is just as real as those smiling faces.
Posts.Title: Side Effects of Arimidex After Almost 2 Years

Posts.Content: I can appreciate the knee pain I seriously thought that my cancer had gone into the bones. What it is is like a severe arthritic pain. it doesn't go away.... I'm dne with the meds I will take natural; products to try and build up the calcium  but synthetic drugs no more!
Posts.Title: Side Effects of Arimidex After Almost 2 Years

Posts.Content: Susier I'm not sure who you were addressing. However, I was on it for 14 months. Month after month day after day I kept trying to convince myself soon the pain would stop - that's what the Dr said.  Of course we believe them. I then went on Tamoxifen , cramps  and everything else then Femarra , it felt like my ankle would snap in two. Finaly Aromatase, that was as bad as ARIMIDEX and they are all the same family. I'm done with the pain.
Posts.Title: Side Effects of Arimidex After Almost 2 Years

Posts.Content: I totally agree with you. Ask your doctor what your chances are by taking Arimidex what percentile of effectiveness are you? I was told the  percent I was  was approx 4% so for 5 years I am goiing to suck out all the nutrients out of my bones feel like I am crippled double over with pain for 4%?  You seriously have to weigh the odds and what is in your best interest. I tried them all I did them all before I wised up that yes it is my choice and giving a drug to every woman may not necessarily fit your cancer.  I'm still here 5 1/2 years later at stage 3 grade 3.. Would I go back on? I talked to my Oncologist last appt and he said NO I probably didn't need to be on it.... Check things out on your own  We have the right to say NO!! without fear being entrenched into our decision.....
Posts.Title: Side Effects of Arimidex After Almost 2 Years

Posts.Content: I am the only female in my family diagnosed with Breast  Cancer. I am sorry for the loss of your sister. losing a sibling is so hard. I lost my yonger brother 3 years ago When they make these drugs as much as they claim they do not work for everyone. I was told there was only a 4% chance of it working. Those are not the greatest odds and why  have something slowly kill me when cancer will likely do the trick
Posts.Title: Side Effects of Arimidex After Almost 2 Years

Posts.Content: You have to be careful with Tamoxifen as well. Before you go to far into your treatment I would suggest yu have a full gyno  appointment. Check for any irregularities  polyps etc. Before I began Tamoxifen I was fine there were no issues to speak of. 13 months later I have severe dysplasia, full of polyps, bleeding and other issues. all these can be precancerous problems of the endometrium.  My Gyno wanted to put me on  a medication through an IUD however there  are hundreds of lawsuits in progress with  a Birth Control calle MIRENA  which is what is used also to stop  estrogen. So you are always hitting a brick wall of some sort. I did not go through months of Chemo for Breast Cancer to trade it for Cervical Cancer from one more drug on the market. The Dr.'s tell you it is not common it is more common than we are being told!!  I  will not take Tamoxifen either or those natural supplements Unless you know what you are doing they can be more harmful. All these preventatives all should have warning labels. because by the looks of things we put our lives into the hands of Dr.'s who are not always giving the full story!! http://www.drugwatch.com/mirena/lawsuit/
Posts.Title: Side Effects of Arimidex After Almost 2 Years

Posts.Content: I wrote this and I have no intention of changing my words to make it seem less . Please read what I wrote again. If the cancer comes back he has no way in predicting how bad or what stage even.  The thing is we don't know that Armidex does avoid cancer at all costs. Women who take the drug faithfully still develop METS.  In fact many  die  who develop  a recurrence .I could give you several examples of this very issue of women I have known who have recently died from METS. who took not only Arimidex but the others in hoping it would work its magic instead of crippling pain. I did not say ALL women die I said MANY I also said I could give you examples. I have lost 5 friends this year who were women taking these particular drugs in hopes they did not  have a recurrence.They did. If you are scared good , because when it comes to this horrendous disease you need to learn to be your own advocate.Find out what's best for you . If it works  then  thats the whole point.  I am simply stating  sometimes the drug does not have the same effect on everyone. One size does not fit all circumstances.
Posts.Title: Side Effects of Arimidex After Almost 2 Years

Posts.Content: I never had any  gynecological issues up and until I began Tamoxifen. It was suggested to me to have my ovaries removed or just go ahead have a hysterectomy. That's more surgery!! I told my Gyno why fix something that's not broke.  We should be made aware of these issues prior to taking drugs, then we can go into  treatment with a full understanding not be scared out of our witts later believing if we don't tow the line something bad will happen! It's unfair to us to be put in a stustion that in either case might not be in our best interest. I have since found another GYN and he agreed to go into surgery may not be the best thing Surgery is not always necessary.
Posts.Title: Side Effects of Arimidex After Almost 2 Years

Posts.Content: Nicole You are going on a roller coaster of emotions and not certain which way is up. It is OK to cry to feel upset and be moody. We can't always expect to have a permanent Happy Face etched on. I was diagnosed in 2009 My son at the time was 16. I did not have family support or anyone to just sit and talk with me.  I had my son. During the months of Chemo he was there for me he cleaned me up brought water washed the floors when I didn't quite make it in time to be sick. He took over running the house doing everything including cooking!! I was and still am so proud of him for taking the inintiative and just doing. Your mom appreciates all you do. She may not be able to express herself well but she does. Don't stop school these outlets are a very important part of your life We have to become part of the "New Normal"!  Talk to your mom, tell her how you feel you may both cry but that's fine too.   Don't forget about your friends too. It is very important that you have your outside sources  to help you through things. Don't predict when your mom may not be here, we don't have the answer to those questions. Call the hospital in your areas Oncology Unit they always have social workers, they are there just for these kinds of situations. Keep a diary, start a blog write down your thoughts and feelings. It is hard for a child to see their parent go through this just as much as it is for your mom.  Please feel free to drop me a line if you like,  Never doubt that your mom doesn't appreciate you for all you do..  Have a movie night with your mom My son and I still do Most of all keep the lines of communication open...  I was diagnosed stage 3 grade 3 Multifocal Breast Cancer  with Lymph node involvement I remember my Oncologist telling me I could live 4 years that's great 5 years a bonus... Again he doesn't know sure they can guess but many women live a long time with STAGE 4 Breast Cancer.....Take good care Alli.......
Posts.Title: Lost, Alone, and in Need of Advice

Posts.Content: On Sep 15, 2005 12:00 AM Cjgeorge wrote: Please advise if anyone but me is experiencing pain in hands, legs, feet from taking aromasin. I have been on the medication for 3 months following Tamaxifin and called physician to explain my concerns and he said to continue but in addition take a baby aspirin. I am concerned that my systems will get worse? Any advise will be helpful. Many thanks!!!! Firstly Im stunned your Dr actually prescrbied baby Aspirin. This is severe legitimate pain you are suffering. I'm, on Tylenol 3 and I take an ocycocet before bed. I have restless leg severe pains in my joints there are nights sleep has been difficult. I have stopped taking everything and will now look into alternatives . The pain 24/7 is unbearable. It's tiresome when the Dr.s' play dumb and try and convince you it's in your head. There are hundreds of us out there suffering. Maybe they should look into alleviating some of the side effects before blaming the patient...
Posts.Title: Side Effects From Aromasin

Posts.Content: I can only tell you from my own personal experience. I had taken them all With Tamoxifen I was developing early signs of possible cervical cancer.  Arimidex, Femarra and the other  sucked the life out of my bones and joints.What is a baby aspirin suppose to do? Nearly 7 years later I have to use a cane and more these days a walker after a severe bout of neuropathy. I read baby aspirin and nearly gagged. I have to take a strong medication just to relieve some of the horrendous pain just so I can walk. I take Hydo-Morph and a Tylenol 3  inbetween if the pain worsens. These Dr.'s prescribe but we as the women who take this poison need to advocate for ourselves and realize One drug is not a "One size fits all"!! I don't regret one second stopping. Otherwise I believe I'd be pushing myself in a wheelchair..
Posts.Title: Side Effects From Aromasin

Posts.Content: Your Dr is concerned enough to consult with someone else. It's to your benefit.   Don't put the appointment off, schedule  before you get home, that way you won't worry as much get it done & over It doesn't neccesarily mean a bad thing.  The surgeon may order a biopsy  through ultrasound or in his office through needle  aspiration.
Posts.Title: Why am I being referred to a surgeon after my ultrasound?

Posts.Content: I have been off everything for nearly 2 years. I am stage 3 grade 3  multifocal breast cancer with lymph node involvement. The side effects were were far to painful to  continue I was in so much pain having to take narcotic pain killers I was on all of them at some point going through forced menopause It was no day in the park. I made the decision that quality of my life was more important than taking these drugs My oncologist gave me the same lecture but it is lick of the draw anyway There is no assurances they will even work long term. as we reas we see tht after a point they no longer work. The damage is done to  my joints Here I am now going into my 5th year of remission. At the end of the day we are the ones going through this cancer ultimately  research for yourself make decisions for yourself. the Dr.s may not always have the right answer relating to us as individuals These drugs are not One Size Fits All!!
Posts.Title: Has anyone gone off of Armimidex ?

Posts.Content: Did you develop Lymphodema by chance? Please do not do acupuncture especially in the area you had rads done You will create more problems. The pain can be a side effect from radiation. You need to see your Oncologist  ASAP have him do a thorough exam or send you to someone who specializes in nerve damage. if yu had issues with your nerves previously, there is where to start looking. Keep your arm mobile. Try not to baby it too much It is painful no doubt but having a frozen arm post mastectomy  with nerve damage with be worse. It sounds almost like you have nueropathy in your rads area... and need treatment  I have nueropathy I take Gabapentin, hydromorph is quite strong to be taking....
Posts.Title: unbearable pain

Posts.Content: Yes it can cause hyper tension I have issues  while I was taking it plus I was on B/P medication my B/P elevated to over 200/110  Arimidex has far too many side effects associated with  this drug...I stopped taking all these meds
Posts.Title: Arimidex side effects.

Posts.Content: Here is what I believe you should do..... Have your Dr refer you to a Pain Clinic.. They have excellent Dr.'s who specialize strictly with pain issues. They may be in a better position to help you in this instance. If  your Dr does not I would suggest that if you are close to a  Hospital with teaching facilities affiliated with a University you will find some answers as to the reasons. Young interns  are always seeking patients to care for and as far as I'm concerned they are more caring willing to help... The Dr should have checked your arm....
Posts.Title: unbearable pain

Posts.Content: Talk to your Oncologist and ask him these questions . We have to be proactive do research and  understand what goies on with our bodies. I  was diagnosed with Stage3 Grade3 Multifocal Breast Cancer in 2009 I had a Bilateral Mastectomy a year later had my second breast removed.  I did have Chemo I opted out of Radiation as much as my Dr fought with me said I was shortening my life.  After doing extensive research radiation in my case may not have been effective.   In the end my Dr did agree and some times I feel radiation is used as a band-aid   as a just in case one doesn't work. I wasn't prepared to go that route.  I am glad I did not... If you are not happy seek out second even third opinions. Alli X
Posts.Title: stg 2 /double mastectomy vs. radiation

Posts.Content: Here is a very good organization to contact...... I have many friends who are involved and they can be very helpful in  guiding you through this new adjustment. I am not Stage 4 but stage 3 grade 3.. I wish you much love ... http://www.metavivor.org/
Posts.Title: Dealing with Stage IV metastic cancer and the emotions that come with it.

Posts.Content: Here is a very good organization to contact...... I have many friends who are involved and they can be very helpful in  guiding you through this new adjustment. I am not Stage 4 but stage 3 grade 3.. I wish you much love ... http://www.metavivor.org/
Posts.Title: Dealing with Stage IV metastic cancer and the emotions that come with it.

Posts.Content: I have had neuropathy for the past two years post Chemo and Tax. In fact my condition is becoming worse. Mine is in my left hand., I am slowly losing the use of my hand which may not be reversible.It 's painful I do use Vitamin B6 Gebapantin no change except becoming worse.
Posts.Title: Nerve damage from Chemo
